name: Panel Royale - Beta Test
description:
A match-3 game, with battle royale action!
Switch blocks in the well horizontally to make combos and chains. The bigger your combos and chains, the more trash you send to smoosh your opponents.
Last one not smooshed wins!

CONTROLS
- WASD / Arrow keys to move cursor
- Space to switch blocks under cursor
- Shift to raise blocks

LAGGY?
Enable hardware acceleration! https://www.webnots.com/what-is-hardware-acceleration-and-how-to-enable-in-browsers/

Join the discord! https://discord.gg/FVEgwnf
